jd: From: pankaj Upadhyay, adventa pankaj.upadhyay@adventatech.com Reply to: pankaj.upadhyay@adventatech.com Job Description -UCOP (University of California Office of the President)Business Systems Analyst (Asset Management) Location: Oakland, CA (100% Remote) Must Live In CA / Manager prefers 1-2 hours from the BayMust have GC or USC or H4 or H1 or TN Visas ONLY (No OPT/EAD)Please include a summary with the must haves about their projects ?? Resumes should not exceed 4 pages. Required Qualifications• 8+ years of advanced knowledge/experience of business and process analysis functions.• Experience and skills managing data cleanups, tagging (AWS tags, potentially in ServiceNow) and begin mapping servers to applications.• Experience defining the data cleanup process, etc. • While we use/prefer SNOW, the process can be tool agnostic. This contactor should have familiarity with Inventory/Asset Management, preferably in SN.• Experience in the Higher Education sector is preferred.• Experience working in Agile, Agile SCRUM, and traditional Waterfall environments.
